topComments.author: Caroline Louise Marsillac Fontes
topComments.comment: Vale a visita. Super organizado, cinema 4D, carrossel, passeio de trem, muitos animais e voc√™ pode alimentar a girafa, as arraiais e os papagaios.

topComments.author: Rute Arruda
topComments.comment: Lugar lindo, √≥timo para passear com nossos filhos.

topComments.author: Asha Thakur
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu tive uma tarde solo no zool√≥gico para matar meu tempo. Entrei √†s 13h30 e terminei a viagem √†s 17h de dia de semana e cobri a maior parte.  Coisas a considerar : ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî- - Reserve os seus bilhetes online com anteced√™ncia. Eles s√≥ aceitam cart√µes em todos os lugares sem dinheiro. - Obtenha um ingresso de experi√™ncia total, vale cada centavo se voc√™ estiver visitando pela primeira vez. Inclui 1) alimenta√ß√£o de - raias, p√°ssaros, girafas. 2) passeios de trem ilimitados. 3) Experi√™ncia de teatro 4D. Junto com a entrada do Zoo. - Voc√™ tem permiss√£o para obter sua pr√≥pria comida (melhor op√ß√£o, eu sinto) - Nunca perca shows 4D. As crian√ßas v√£o adorar. V√° com anteced√™ncia se eles dizem que o jogo √© √†s 15h, esteja l√° antes de 5 minutos. ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî Eu amo o fato de que os jardins s√£o realmente bem cuidados e com este calor louco ao redor eu gostava de caminhar √† tarde tamb√©m.  Eu amo o fato de que os volunt√°rios s√£o realmente muito amig√°veis. Est√° acima de 5 estrelas por sua atitude e gesto gentil.  No geral, √© um pouco caro, mas voc√™ aproveitar√° a viagem com seu pacote de experi√™ncia total.  (Original) I had solo blasting afternoon at the zoo to kill my time. I entered at 1.30 pm and I finished the trip at 5 pm on weekday and I covered most of it.  Things to consider : ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî- - Book your tickets online in advance. They only accept cards every where no cash. - Get total experience ticket it‚Äôs worth every penny if you are visiting for the first time. It includes 1) feeding of - string rays , birds , Giraffe. 2) unlimited train rides. 3) 4D theatre experience. Along with Zoo entrance. - You are allowed get your own food ( better option I feel ) - Never miss 4D shows. Kids will love it . Go in advance if they say play is at 3 pm be there before 5 mins. ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî I love the fact that gardens are really maintained well and with this crazy hot around I enjoyed walking in the afternoon too.  I love the fact that volunteers are really very friendly. It‚Äôs above 5 star for their attitude and kind gesture.  Overall it‚Äôs bit pricey but you will enjoy the trip with your total experience package.

topComments.author: Tammy Lawson
topComments.comment: Great zoo. Went on a Monday.  Staff is educated and friendly. The cafe is only open on weekends and we were looking forward to eating there. It's clean and plenty of places to sit if you need a rest. Could use newer signage on animals. Maps throughout the zoo would be great too.

topComments.author: Joe Marcy Rinehart
topComments.comment: Visited on a Saturday. We love the layout of this zoo. It has been nearly 15 years since we visited JZ & G. We live near Columbus, Ohio, so we know what a top of the line metropolitan zoo looks like. We love how the parking is close to the entrance...and that there is no charge for parking. Getting tickets online before was very convenient and easy. The fact that we got to see three Sumatran Tigers made the price of admission worth it alone. The Asian section of the zoo is a definite highlight. We also like that they offer multiple viewing areas for animals. The sculpture art is top-notch, especially the dragon. A special highlight was the tree full of wood stork babies crying to be fed and their mothers all doing so. Staff was very friendly. The food was good. Only negative was that the women's restrooms need cleaned on a tighter rotation. Overall, a wonderful experience.

topComments.author: Dee Riegel
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Agradavelmente surpreso! Funcion√°rios simp√°ticos e bem conservados. Fiquei surpreso ao descobrir que eles n√£o aceitam dinheiro, voc√™ tem que pedir os ingressos com anteced√™ncia, mesmo a loja de presentes s√≥ aceita pl√°stico, üòè Os animais estavam todos fora, espa√ßo de brincadeira adequado para todos os animais. Os funcion√°rios estavam no local. Pronto para responder a qualquer pergunta que voc√™ tenha. Desgaste voc√™ est√° andando sapatos lugar √© enorme. Espere gastar pelo menos 3 horas ou mais. Prepare o seu almo√ßo, aproveite o seu dia, traga o seu spray para insetos. Voc√™ pode precisar dele em certas √°reas. Na √©poca em que fomos, dezembro n√£o estava frio, n√£o era quente. Estava certo. N√£o foi excessivamente lotado tamb√©m. N√≥s tivemos um dia muito agrad√°vel  (Original) Pleasantly surprised! Friendly staff, well maintained. Was surprised to find out they don't take cash, you have to order you tickets in advance,even the gift shop only takes plastic, üòè The animals were all out,  adequate romping room for all animals The staff were out on the grounds. Ready to answer any questions you have.  Wear you're walking shoes  place is huge. Expect to spend at least 3 plus hours. Pack your lunch, enjoy your day, bring your bugs spray. You may need it in certain areas. The time we went December wasn't cold, wasn't hot. It was just right. Was not overly crowded either. We had a very enjoyable day

topComments.author: L B
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) As girafas ficaram lindas. Os tigres eram lindos quando n√£o andavam de um lado para o outro. A paisagem √© linda. Aprecie as flores, o bambu, veja o esfor√ßo ali. Caso contr√°rio, algo triste, infeliz e seco pairava sobre todo o lugar em rela√ß√£o aos animais e exposi√ß√µes vazias. Pelo menos, n√£o vimos... Sem √°guia careca, sem perus, sem lobo, sem urso, sem on√ßa. Parece que muito estava faltando nas visitas anteriores. Sem mapas. Precisa de tinta fresca e TLC nas exposi√ß√µes, janelas e portas limpas. Vimos mais do que pens√°vamos serem abutres do que qualquer outra coisa e eles estavam sendo pulverizados para evitar a exibi√ß√£o de flamingos quando lutavam como se estivessem esperando para pegar os fracos ou mortos. Basta lembrar de uma vibra√ß√£o diferente quando eu era crian√ßa aqui em viagens de campo e visitas com meus filhos quando eram pequenos. Eles s√£o adultos agora e sentem a diferen√ßa tamb√©m. Sente que os animais precisam de balan√ßos/brinquedos de pneus ou motiva√ß√£o para serem felizes. Os animais que estavam l√° hoje n√£o est√£o dando a impress√£o de que est√£o felizes.  (Original) The giraffes were beautiful. The tigers were beautiful when not pacing. The landscape is beautiful. Appreciate the flowers, the bamboo, can see the effort there. Otherwise, something sad, unfortunate, and dry was looming over the whole place in regards to the animals and empty exhibits. At least, we didn't see...No bald eagle, No turkeys, No wolf, No bear, No jaguar. Seems like so much was missing from past visits. No maps. In need of fresh paint & TLC in the exhibits, clean windows and doors. Saw more of what we thought were vultures than anything else and they were being sprayed to keep out of the flamingo exhibit when they were fighting as if they were waiting to scoop up the weak or dead ones. Just remember a different vibe when I was a kid here on field trips and visits with my children when they were little ones. They're adults now and they feel the difference too. Feels the animals need tire swings/toys or motivation to be happy. The animals that were there today are not giving off the vibe that they are happy.

topComments.author: lorenda S Ashley
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â sempre bom passar o dia com os meus netos. Funcion√°rios simp√°ticos e muitos animais para ver. Os ingressos s√£o comprados apenas online. Comprei a experi√™ncia total para adultos por 32,95. Inclui 4D Theatre, Unlimited Train, Unlimited Carousel Rides e Animal Feedings (limitado). O hor√°rio do zool√≥gico √© das 9h √†s 17h  (Original) It's always nice to spend the day with my grandkids. Nice friendly staff and lots of animals to see. Tickets are purchased online only. I purchased the adult total experience for 32.95. Includes 4D Theater, Unlimited Train, Unlimited Carousel Rides, and Animal Feedings (limited). Zoo hours are 9am-5pm

topComments.author: Keira Packard
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Se voc√™ n√£o foi ao zool√≥gico ultimamente, voc√™ deve ir! Os habitats mais recentes s√£o incr√≠veis! A comida no Trout River Grill teve uma reforma e meu hamb√∫rguer e batatas fritas estavam deliciosos! As instala√ß√µes do banheiro podem usar um pouco de TLC e alguns dos habitats mais antigos podem precisar de alguma aten√ß√£o. No geral foi uma √≥tima visita!  (Original) If you haven't been to the zoo lately, you should go! The newer habitats are amazing! The food at the Trout River Grill has had a makeover and my burger and fries were delicious! The bathroom facilities could use a little TLC and some of the older habitats could use some attention. Overall it was a great visit!

topComments.author: Lotoya Phillips
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Os animais estavam acordados e deitados, os funcion√°rios do parque eram amig√°veis. Fomos no final de semana do Super Bowl, n√£o muito cheio e com v√°rias atra√ß√µes interativas (alimenta√ß√£o dos animais). Um √≥timo lugar para fam√≠lias e funcion√°rios bem informados sobre os animais üíô Belos jardins / folhagens tamb√©m.  (Original) The animals were woke and lying about, park workers were friendly. We went Super Bowl weekend, not too crowded and several interactive attractions (feeding the animals). A great place for families and staff was knowledgeable about the animals üíô Beautiful gardens/foliage as well.

topComments.author: Chris Mortensen
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Jacksonville Zoo √© uma propriedade paisag√≠stica com muitos animais bem cuidados. Ele est√° localizado na Rt 95. Paramos no caminho para o aeroporto e aproveitamos a tarde, especialmente as girafas. Esteja ciente de que os ingressos devem ser comprados com anteced√™ncia! Tivemos que comprar no estacionamento em nossos telefones para apresentar no port√£o.  (Original) Jacksonville Zoo is a beautifully landscaped property with many well cared for animals. It is located right off Rt 95. We stopped on our way to the airport and enjoyed the afternoon, especially the giraffes. Be aware tickets must be bought in advance! We had to buy from the parking lot on our phones to present at the gate.

topComments.author: Salina Sanchez
topComments.comment: I've had a membership to the Jacksonville Zoo and Gardens for about 5 years. We love coming to see and interact with the animals! The zoo always offers special events and activities and members get discounts and first access to pretty much everything.

topComments.author: Julia Bergeron
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Dia incr√≠vel! Zoo √© definido de uma forma muito amig√°vel. Tamb√©m √© acess√≠vel para deficientes em todos os aspectos. Tivemos uma bola, tiramos toneladas de fotos e tivemos um bom almo√ßo!  (Original) Amazing day! Zoo is laid out in a very walking friendly way. It is also handicap accessible in every aspect. We had a ball, took tons of pictures, and had a nice lunch!

topComments.author: Kimberly Gerlach
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fomos durante as f√©rias de primavera do nosso filho. O zool√≥gico √© um dia divertido em fam√≠lia para qualquer idade. Fomos aben√ßoados com um clima perfeito. Cheguei ao zool√≥gico assim que eles abriram, ent√£o sem filas e com muito pouca multid√£o. Os animais estavam apenas sendo alimentados, ent√£o foi legal v√™-los todos ativos e brincando. Meus filhos adoraram acariciar as arraias e ver os shows em 4D. üòéTemos sete filhos, ent√£o preparamos um piquenique em vez de comprar comida l√°. O zool√≥gico permite que voc√™ traga piqueniques na √°rea de piquenique, o que √© super legal. Ligue com anteced√™ncia e avise-os e eles manter√£o seus refrigeradores e almo√ßos frios no Guest Services enquanto voc√™ caminha pelo zool√≥gico. Quando estiver pronto para comer, a equipe o ajudar√° na √°rea de piquenique gratuitamente. ü§© T√£o bom! Adorei ver os macacos rec√©m-nascidos. Os gorilas s√£o sempre divertidos. ü¶çO vidro da exposi√ß√£o da lontra e do pinguim estava rachado, ent√£o n√£o conseguimos v√™-los. üòï Mas havia uma tonelada de outros animais por a√≠. √Åguias, jacar√©s, coiotes, cobras, lagartos, tartarugas, tigres, le√µes, avestruzes, rinocerontes, ursos e muito mais. As girafas eram as favoritas de toda a fam√≠lia. ü¶íEles eram muito ativos e vieram at√© n√≥s. Eu n√£o tenho filhos mais novos, ent√£o n√£o fizemos a zona de respingo. N√≥s montamos o trem que √© perfeito para fazer uma pausa e ver os animais da perspectiva dos tratadores do zool√≥gico. üöÇ Claro que todas as crian√ßas querem ser cuidadoras de zool√≥gico quando crescerem depois disso. üòÖ Dia em fam√≠lia divertido!! #springbreak2022  (Original) We went during our kid‚Äôs Spring Break. The zoo is a fun family day for any age. We were blessed with perfect weather. Got to the zoo just as they opened so no lines and very little crowds. The animals were just being fed so it was cool to see them all out active and playing. My kids loved petting the sting rays and seeing the 4D shows. üòéWe have seven kids so we packed a picnic lunch instead of buying food there. The zoo allows you to bring picnics into the picnic area which is super nice. Call ahead and let them know and they‚Äôll keep your coolers and lunches cold at Guest Services while you walk the zoo. When you‚Äôre ready to eat the staff will help you to the picnic area all free of charge. ü§© So nice! Loved seeing the newborn monkeys. The gorillas are always fun. ü¶çThe otter and the penguin exhibit‚Äôs glass was cracked so we weren‚Äôt able to see them. üòï But there were a ton of other animals out and about. Eagles, Gators, Coyotes, snakes, lizards, Tortoise, Tigers, Lions, Ostrich, Rhino, Bears, and more. The giraffes were a favorite for all the family. ü¶íThey were very active and came right up to us. I don‚Äôt have younger kids so we didn‚Äôt do the splash zone. We did ride the train which is perfect for taking a break and seeing the animals from the zoo keepers perspective. üöÇ Of course all the kids want to be zoo keepers when they grow up after that. üòÖ Fun family day!! #springbreak2022
